full_output.summary: IT undergraduate seeking opportunities in Software Development, Data Analysis, Web Development, or Cloud Computing. Proficient in data analytics and web development. Eager to leverage academic foundation in programming and emerging technologies to contribute to impactful software applications.

certifications.title: FinTech and the Transformation in Financial Services

projects.name: PIXOGENE: Image Encryption via DNA Encoding
projects.description: Developed an image encryption system using DNA encoding techniques. Implemented pixel-to-DNA sequence conversion for enhanced security. Created a user interface for image encryption and management. Achieved a 25% improvement in encryption speed and efficiency.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a full-stack web application for hospital management. Developed integrated software modules for database management and user interface. Ensured secure data handling and efficient data management practices.

projects.name: License Plate Detection and Recognition System
projects.description: Engineered a high-performance web application for license plate recognition. Implemented a custom OCR deep learning model to enhance recognition speed. Achieved 95% accuracy in recognizing license plates from complex images. Designed and optimized MySQL database for high-volume data processing.

experiences.role_name: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation
experiences.description: Completed a simulation focused on advising a hypothetical social media client as a Data Analyst at Accenture. 7 data sets were cleaned, modeled and analyzed to uncover insights into content trends. Prepared a PowerPoint deck and video presentation to communicate key insights.

Set up a local development environment by downloading necessary files and tools. Fixed broken files in the repository to ensure correct functionality of the web application. Utilized JP-Morgan Chases open-source library Perspective for live data visualization.
